code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const skills=["Python","JavaScript","React","AWS","Docker","Linux","Terraform","Ansible","CloudFormation","CI/CD","Git","Networking"];const Skills=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"skills",className:"py-20 px-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center text-gray-800 dark:text-white mb-10",children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap justify-center gap-4 max-w-4xl mx-auto",children:skills.map(skill=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 dark:bg-blue-900 dark:text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full shadow-sm text-sm",children:skill},skill))})]});};export default Skills;
